synonym.title: Code embedding
Entry point
Detect language unavailability
synonym.code:
<script type='text/javascript'>
  if (navigator.userAgent.indexOf('(Dart)') === -1) {
    // Browser doesn't support Dart
  }
</script>

synonym.title: Printing to the console
synonym.code: print('Level completed.');

synonym.title: Modal alerts
synonym.code:
import 'dart:html';
window.alert('Clicked on the button.');

synonym.title: Define a library
Use a library
Create + assign value
Default value
Hoisting
Final variables
Arrays / Lists
Key-value pairs
Appropriate keys
Accessing values
Sets (collections of unique items)
Queues (FIFO)
Raw strings
Interpolation
Concatenation
Substring
synonym.code: 'doghouses'.substring(3, 8); // == 'house'

synonym.title: Replace all occurences
synonym.code: 'doghouses'.replaceAll('s','z'); // == 'doghouzez'

synonym.title: Replace one occurence
synonym.code: 'racecar'.replaceFirst('r', 'sp'); // == 'spacecar'

synonym.title: Multi-line strings
Split into an array
Test whether a string starts with a substring
If statements
Ternary statements
Checking for empty string
Checking for zero
Checking for null
Checking for NaN
Checking for undefined
synonym.code: // Dart does not have a concept of undefined

synonym.title: Value and identity equality
Function definition
Return value
Assign a function to a variable
synonym.code:
var loudify = (msg) => msg.toUpperCase();
loudify('not gonna take it anymore'); // NOT GONNA TAKE IT ANYMORE

synonym.title: Optional parameters
Parameters with default values
Named parameters
Variable number of arguments
synonym.code: // Dart does not support variable numbers of arguments

synonym.title: For loops for lists
For-in loops
For loops for objects/maps
Closures and counters in loops
Define
Constructor with parameter
Instantiate
synonym.code: var person = new Person();

synonym.title: Reflection
synonym.code: var name = "Bob"; name.runtimeType // == String

synonym.title: Check the type
Subclass
Operator "overloading"
Find one element by id
synonym.code: querySelector('#main');

synonym.title: Find one element by class
synonym.code: querySelector('.visible');

synonym.title: Find many elements by class
synonym.code: querySelectorAll('.visible');

synonym.title: Find one element by tag
synonym.code: querySelector('div');

synonym.title: Find many elements by tag
synonym.code: querySelectorAll('div');

synonym.title: Find one element by name
synonym.code: querySelector('[name="form"]');

synonym.title: Find many elements by name
synonym.code: querySelectorAll('[name="form"]');

synonym.title: Find elements by combination of above
synonym.code:
querySelector('#main').querySelector('div').querySelectorAll('.visible');
querySelectorAll('#main div:first-of-type .visible');

synonym.title: Iterate over a list of elements
Access the first child
synonym.code:
elem.children.first;
elem.children[0];

synonym.title: Find out whether an element has children elements
synonym.code: !elem.nodes.isEmpty;

synonym.title: Create an element
Create an element and set its contents
synonym.code:
var element = new Element.html('

A quick brown fox.

');

synonym.title: Add an element to a parent
synonym.code: element.children.add(newElement);

synonym.title: Remove an element from its parent
synonym.code: element.remove();

synonym.title: Throw an exception
Catch an exception
Attach an event handler
Remove an event handler
synonym.code: var subscription = element.onClick.listen(handleOnClick); subscription.cancel();

synonym.title: Schedule a future event
synonym.code: import 'dart:async'; var timer = new Timer(new Duration(milliseconds:500), () { … });

synonym.title: Measure the execution time of a function
Get HTML attribute
synonym.code: element.attributes['href'];

synonym.title: Set HTML attribute
synonym.code: element.attributes['playable'] = true;

synonym.title: Remove HTML attribute
synonym.code: element.attributes.remove('playable');

synonym.title: Check if HTML attribute exists
synonym.code: element.attributes.containsKey('href');

synonym.title: Add CSS class
synonym.code: element.classes.add('new-class');

synonym.title: Remove CSS class
synonym.code: element.classes.remove('new-class');

synonym.title: Request data via XMLHttpRequest
React to document finishing loading
synonym.code:
window.onContentLoaded.listen((e) => print('Content is loaded'));
// However, main() will normally run after DOMContentLoaded

synonym.title: Node lookup
synonym.code: var els = querySelectorAll('div');

synonym.title: Node creation
Event handling
Relative nodes
Children
Clone
synonym.code: var clonedElement = querySelector('#about').clone(true);

synonym.title: Random
Sine and Cosine
Convert a String to a number
synonym.code:
int.parse('3') // == 3
double.parse('3.14') // == 3.14
int.parse('3px') // ERROR: throws FormatException int.parse('three') // ERROR: throws FormatException

synonym.title: Eval
synonym.code: // Dart doesn't support eval(). This is not a bug.

synonym.title: Adding a method to a class
synonym.code: // Dart doesn't support changing a class after // the program has been compiled
